verses.plain: Set thy heart upon thy goods; and say not, I have enough for my life.

tokens.t: Set thy heart upon thy goods; and say not, I have enough for my life.

verses.plain: Follow not thine own mind and thy strength, to walk in the ways of thy heart:

tokens.t: Follow not thine own mind and thy strength, to walk in the ways of thy heart:

verses.plain: And say not, Who shall controul me for my works? for the Lord will surely revenge thy pride.

tokens.t: And say not, Who shall controul me for my works? for the Lord will surely revenge thy pride.

verses.plain: Say not, I have sinned, and what harm hath happened unto me? for the Lord is longsuffering, he will in no wise let thee go.

tokens.t: Say not, I have sinned, and what harm hath happened unto me? for the Lord is longsuffering, he will in no wise let thee go.

verses.plain: Concerning propitiation, be not without fear to add sin unto sin:

tokens.t: Concerning propitiation, be not without fear to add sin unto sin:

verses.plain: And say not His mercy is great; he will be pacified for the multitude of my sins: for mercy and wrath come from him, and his indignation resteth upon sinners.

tokens.t: And say not His mercy is great; he will be pacified for the multitude of my sins: for mercy and wrath come from him, and his indignation resteth upon sinners.

verses.plain: Make no tarrying to turn to the Lord, and put not off from day to day: for suddenly shall the wrath of the Lord come forth, and in thy security thou shalt be destroyed, and perish in the day of vengeance.

tokens.t: Make no tarrying to turn to the Lord, and put not off from day to day: for suddenly shall the wrath of the Lord come forth, and in thy security thou shalt be destroyed, and perish in the day of vengeance.

verses.plain: Set not thine heart upon goods unjustly gotten, for they shall not profit thee in the day of calamity.

tokens.t: Set not thine heart upon goods unjustly gotten, for they shall not profit thee in the day of calamity.

verses.plain: Winnow not with every wind, and go not into every way: for so doth the sinner that hath a double tongue.

tokens.t: Winnow not with every wind, and go not into every way: for so doth the sinner that hath a double tongue.

verses.plain: Be stedfast in thy understanding; and let thy word be the same.

tokens.t: Be stedfast in thy understanding; and let thy word be the same.

verses.plain: Be swift to hear; and let thy life be sincere; and with patience give answer.

tokens.t: Be swift to hear; and let thy life be sincere; and with patience give answer.

verses.plain: If thou hast understanding, answer thy neighbour; if not, lay thy hand upon thy mouth.

tokens.t: If thou hast understanding, answer thy neighbour; if not, lay thy hand upon thy mouth.

verses.plain: Honour and shame is in talk: and the tongue of man is his fall.

tokens.t: Honour and shame is in talk: and the tongue of man is his fall.

verses.plain: Be not called a whisperer, and lie not in wait with thy tongue: for a foul shame is upon the thief, and an evil condemnation upon the double tongue.

tokens.t: Be not called a whisperer, and lie not in wait with thy tongue: for a foul shame is upon the thief, and an evil condemnation upon the double tongue.

verses.plain: Be not ignorant of any thing in a great matter or a small.

tokens.t: Be not ignorant of any thing in a great matter or a small.
